2 https: cdm.unfecc.int/Projects/DB/RWTUV1476171677.04/view

VCs

Verification Report: VCS Version 4.2

As per the registered IRR excel sheet /06/, the additionality breaching point for the power generation is +34.2%. Since the generation is 29% higher during this monitoring period which is less than +34.2%, project is still additional with the higher generation. Hence verification team confirm that higher generation do not have any impact on the project additionality and project is still additional. The same is accepted to the verification team.

Project activity provide local jobs and upgrade the existing roads, directly contributing to the improvement of infrastructure in region. Section 1.11 of the Monitoring report has been checked and found OK. The project activity contributes positively to sustainable development which has been verified from the site visit interview of the Local people (Section 2.3 of this report) and supportive documents /24/.

Finding: No finding raised.
